Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
This class contains the database queries for appointments.

    • allAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> allAppointments() throws SQLException
      This method queries all appointments from the appointments table in the database.
      Returns:
      The list of appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - The exception to throw if there is an error with database connection or with the query.

    • currentMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> currentMonth() throws SQLException
      This method queries the current month's appointments.
      Returns:
      All appointments for the current month.
      Throws:
      SQLException - The exception to throw if there are errors with database connection or the query.

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> currentWeek() throws SQLException
      This method queries the current week's appointments.
      Returns:
      All appointments for the current week.
      Throws:
      SQLException - The exception to throw if there are errors with database connection or the query.

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, String addContact, String addType, String addTitle, String addDescription, String addLocation, int addCustID, int addUserID) throws SQLException
      This method inserts a new appointment in appointments table in the database.
      Parameters:
      addContact - The contact to add.
      addCustID - The customer ID to add.
      addDescription - The description to add.
      addLocation - The location to add.
      addTitle - The title to add.
      addType - The type to add.
      addUserID - The user to add.
      endDateTime - The end date/time to add.
      startDateTime - The start date/time to add.
      Throws:
      SQLException - The exception to throw if there are errors with database connection or the query.

    • modifyAppointment

      public static void modifyAppointment(int modApptID, String modTitle, String modDescription, String modLocation, String modType, LocalDateTime modStartDateTime, LocalDateTime modEndDateTime, int modCustID, int modUserID, String modContact) throws SQLException
      This method modifies data that is part of an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      modApptID - The appointment ID to reference.
      modContact - The contact to modify.
      modCustID - The customer ID to modify.
      modDescription - The description to modify.
      modEndDateTime - The end date/time to modify.
      modLocation - The location to modify.
      modStartDateTime - The start date/time to modify.
      modTitle - The title to modify.
      modType - The type to modify.
      modUserID - The user ID to modify.
      Throws:
      SQLException - The exception to throw if there are errors with database connection or the query.

    • deleteAppt

      public static void deleteAppt(Appointment appointment) throws SQLException
      This method deletes a selected appointment from the appointments table in the database.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment to delete.
      Throws:
      SQLException - The exception to throw if there are errors with database connection or the query.
